# **Overview**

In this part, the expression factors were inferred from expression matrices for 6 cell types. For each cell type, the number of LVs are shown in the [table](https://xsun1229.github.io/factor_analysis/factors_traits.html#512_expression_factors)

### Several Cases

#### **EUR.CD_lv36**

**EUR.CD_lv36_rs80262450** has PP4 = 0.87.

LV36 has 3 related pathways reported by PLIER. They are [1.GSE22886_NAIVE_TCELL_VS_MONOCYTE_UP](http://www.gsea-msigdb.org/gsea/msigdb/geneset_page.jsp?geneSetName=GSE22886_NAIVE_TCELL_VS_MONOCYTE_UP&keywords=GSE22886_NAIVE_TCELL_VS_MONOCYTE_UP), [2.GSE36476_YOUNG_VS_OLD_DONOR_MEMORY_CD4_TCELL_DN](http://www.gsea-msigdb.org/gsea/msigdb/geneset_page.jsp?geneSetName=GSE36476_YOUNG_VS_OLD_DONOR_MEMORY_CD4_TCELL_DN&keywords=GSE36476_YOUNG_VS_OLD_DONOR_MEMORY_CD4_TCELL_DN), [3.GSE22886_NAIVE_VS_IGM_MEMORY_BCELL_UP](https://www.gsea-msigdb.org/gsea/msigdb/cards/GSE22886_NAIVE_VS_IGM_MEMORY_BCELL_UP).

These pathways are associated with T cells and B cells. They are biological plausible: 
[Dissecting the Heterogeneity in T-Cell Mediated Inflammation in IBD](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7016883/), [Targeting B cells for inflammatory bowel disease treatment: back to the future](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7894973/).

The ORA results for top25% genes of LV36 find two pathways: lysosome organization and lytic vacuole organization. It seems to be plausible too: [The Roles of Lysosomes in Inflammation and Autoimmune Diseases](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.3109/08830185.2014.936587?journalCode=iiri20)

### Sevaral cases

#### **rbc_lv39**

It has 1 pathway reported by PLIER :GSE22886_NEUTROPHIL_VS_DC_DN. It means ['Genes down-regulated in comparison of neutrophils versus dendritic cells (DC)'](https://www.gsea-msigdb.org/gsea/msigdb/geneset_page.jsp?geneSetName=GSE22886_NEUTROPHIL_VS_DC_DN&keywords=GSE22886_NEUTROPHIL_VS_DC_DN)

We found that neutrophils can take up RBCs under some conditions: [Under homeostatic conditions, neutrophils do not take up RBCs. Yet, when RBCs are immunoglobulin G (IgG) opsonized, which can occur in alloimmunization or autoimmunization reactions, neutrophils can effectively phagocytose RBCs.](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31182561/)

**rbc_lv39_rs4791641** has PP4 =0.6


#### **lymph_lv59**

It has 3 pathways reported by PLIER.1.REACTOME_CROSS_PRESENTATION_OF_SOLUBLE_EXOGENOUS_ANTIGENS_ENDOSOMES, 2.REACTOME_INTERFERON_SIGNALING, 3.KEGG_LEISHMANIA_INFECTION. [Lymphadenopathy as the first sign of human cutaneous infection by Leishmania braziliensis](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/7573708/)

PP4 of lymph_lv59_rs62449495 is 0.62
PP4 of lymph_lv59_rs2369391 is 0.59
